name: BORED
description: $BORED is the leading meme coin on Ape Chain, inspired by the culture and creativity of the iconic Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC). Designed to be more than just a token, $BORED embraces the power of community, humor, and blockchain innovation. As the flagship meme coin of the Ape ecosystem, $BORED delivers engaging campaigns, seamless on-chain utility, and endless fun, uniting Ape enthusiasts and meme coin lovers worldwide.
